name: CatFight : The Ultimate Female Fighting Game
name_original: CatFight : The Ultimate Female Fighting Game
description: Eleven of the fiercest female warriors from across the ethers battle it out for the universe in Catfight - the very first all-female fighting game. Watch the head-to-head fighting assault blaze its way to your screen - with the hottest women in games engaging in the most violent fighting techniques imaginable! Disembowelment, decapitation, and worse! It's the ultimate life-versus-death struggle where you must pulverize your opponents in eight awesome arenas to survive! And to claim your place next to the most awesome women in the galaxy.
